Belt Syllabus

Junior:

Level Junior Syllabus
7th Kyu White to Yellow Belt
6th Kyu Yellow to Orange Belt
5th Kyu Orange to Green Belt
4th Kyu Green to Green-Stripe Belt
3rd Kyu Green-Stripe to Blue Belt
2nd Kyu Blue to Brown Belt
1st Kyu Brown to Brown-Stripe Belt
Shodan Brown-Stripe to Black Belt

Adult:

Level Adult Syllabus
7th Kyu White to Yellow Belt
6th Kyu Yellow to Orange Belt
5th Kyu Orange to Green Belt
4th Kyu Green to Green-Stripe Belt
3rd Kyu Green-Stripe to Blue Belt
2nd Kyu Blue to Brown Belt
1st Kyu Brown to Brown-Stripe Belt
Shodan Brown-Stripe to Black Belt
Nidan Black To 2nd Black Belt (Nidan)
